title: Book Travel for Film Festival
description: A film has been accepted into an international film festival. An agent needs to book flights and hotels for the director and two lead actors.

tasks.description: Retrieve the travel dates and the list of attendees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the required travel details.

tasks.description: Search for flights and hotels that meet the company's travel policy and budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds suitable flight and hotel options.

tasks.description: Book the selected flights and hotels and send the itineraries to the attendees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes all bookings and sends confirmations.
